Articles.Content:
hello everyone this is Princess Venus and this is the Kerbal X colony project. its a gorup project were anyone can joing in modded or not in this you can design anything in reason Fiction designs are exsepted but replicated designs are not.

The votes are in everyone and laythe won by 1 vote more than duna sadly tylo was the lowest voted. Any ways its time to start now i'm going to tell what mods are axsepted.

Update to the mods list please look and note its needs kethane to work and fly safe

ok times up please show me your rockets

What to design at the moment:

Do you know the saying once you get in orbit your halfway to anywere well this is something to think about so i say lets design a family of rockets why? One rocket its not going to cut the job but multiple rockets with simular designs for different payloads and different payload masses good luck

Top tip:

Use the inline probe cores for building your rockets so others can build there payloads on top

Mods:

Kerbal Attachment System

Kethane :-)

KSPX

RubberBand Tracks

RLA Electric Engines and stockalike Parts

Romfare docking cam

RW flareing 1m and 2m

Mechjeb 2.0 up (intergrated with pods)

Extraplanetary Launchpads

Edited June 22, 2013 by princess venus

Is it floating?

It's landed ;p Jool is in fact solid, if you go about 100m beneath the surface.

It's out of fuel tho, so it'll be staying there (not that it'd be able to go up thru jools atmosphere anyhow)

well i dont know how much it can carry

Well here is the Rover It is able to collect a lot of kethane and convert it into fuel. It can carry 5 crew and it is also able to drill at night and day because of all the batteries. It has a small rover underneath to be able to transfer the fuel that the Kethane Rover converts to any other craft with then docking port the same height. https://www.dropbox.com/s/hrf4d2dafd8dlhq/Kethane%20Rover.craft
